data.text: Masuole chu, Jisua'n Galilee rama a chaia; Juda rachamneipungeiin that rang an bôk sikin Judea rama chu chai nuom khâi mak.
Judangei Kâirêng khohoi zora anâi zoia,7:2: Och 23:34; Bal 16:13
masikin Jisua lâibungngei han a kôm, “Hi mun hih mâk inla, Judea rama se roh, masika han nu nûkjûi ngeiin ni sintho an mu theina rangin, an tia.
Ama riming inthang rang nuompu chu tutên a sintho thup ngâi mak. Hi neinunngei hih ni sin anînchu rammuol pumpuiin nu chungroi riet rese bah!” an tia.
(A lâibungngei luon ama iem mak ngei.)
Jisua'n an kôm, “Keima rangin chu azora diktak la tung mak. Zora pai hih nangni rangin chu adik ani.
Rammuolin nangni mumâk maka, aniatachu keima chu mi mumâk ngâi, a sintho ngei ha sa mak tiin ki ril ngâi sikin.
Khohoia nangni lei se roi, kei chu khohoia la se7:8: Kei chu se no ning; miziek senkhat ngei an dôn chu Kei chu la se no ning. thei no ning, ko zora diktak ala tung loi sikin,” a tia.
Ma chong hah a ti suole khom ama chu Galilee rama a la om bang.
A lâibungngei khohoia an se suole chu Jisua khom a se sa; ânlangin chu se maka, inrûkin a se zoi.
Juda rachamneipungeiin khohoia han ama an roka, “Khonmo aom?” tiin an rekel titira.
Mipuingeiin a chungroia an inkereng chichiena; senkhatin, “Miriem sa kêng,” an tia. Adang ngeiin, “Nimak, ama kêng mingei lamnôk tieng a tuong ngâi,” an tia.
Hannirese Juda rachamneipungei an chi sikin tutên ânlangin chu a chungroi misîr ngam mak ngei.
Khohoi ha inang dôr an mang tena chu Jisua Biekina a sea mingei a minchu phut zoi.
Juda rachamneipungei han an kamâm sabaka, “Hi mi hi ânchuna boi tetin kho angin mo madôr a riet thei hi!” an tia.
Jisua'n a thuona, “Ki minchuna chong hih keima kata nimaka, aniatachu Pathien mi tîrpu renga juong kêng ani.
Tutu khom Pathien lungdo a sin nuom kai chu hi minchuna chong hih Pathien renga juong mo, aninônchu ka rachama ko chong mo riet an tih.
Tukhom ama rachama chongpu chu ama roiinpuina man rang a pût ani. Hannirese, a tîrpu roiminpui rang a nuompu'n chu dikna a dôna, male ama sûnga han dikloina reng omak.
Moses'n Balam nangni a pêk nimak mo? Hannirese Balam hah tutên jôm mak chei. Ithomo ni that rang nin bôk hi?” a tia.
Mipuingei han, “Ramkhori nang a sûr ngihi! Tumo nang that rang a bôk?” tiin lokongeiin an thuona.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Sininkhêl inkhat ko thoa, nin rêngin nin kamâm sabaka.
Moses'n nin nâipasalngei sertan rangin chong nangni a pêka (Moses'n a phut nimaka, nin richibulngeiin kêng an phut ani), masikin Sabbathnin pasalte ser nin tan ngâi ani.7:22 Och 12:3; Aph 17:10
Moses Balam asiet loina rangin Sabbathni khom pasalte sertan nin tho ngâi anînte, keiman Sabbathnia mi ki mindam phar sikin ithomo ku chunga nin takasi?7:23: Joh 5:9
Pêntienga ânlang rang vaiin roijêk mong ungla, male adiktakin roijêk roi,” a tia.
Jerusalema mi senkhatin an tia, “Hi mi hih rachamneipungeiin that ranga an pût ha nimak mo?
En ta u! Mipui rietin thurchi a misîra, male tutên rokôk mak ngei! Ama hih Messiah ani tiin rachamneipu ngeiin an riet tatak zoi mini?
Aniatachu Messiah a juong tika chu kho renga mo a juong tutên riet no ni ngei. Hi mi hi chu a hongna ei rêngin ei riet-iem ani,” an tia.

Jisua'n Biekina a minchu lâihan rôl inringtakin a tia, “Tumo ki ni le kho renga hong mo ki ni nin riet tatak mo zoi? Ka rachama juong ni mu-ung. Mi tîrpu chu mi diktak ani. Nangnin chu ama ha riet mak choia,
aniatachu keiman chu ama ha ki rieta, a kôm renga juong le ama mi tîr ki ni sikin,” a tia.
Hanchu ama hah sûr rang an pût zoia, aniatachu, azora ala tung loi sikin tutên an kut musum mak ngei.
Hannirese mipui lâia mi tamtakin chu ama an iem zoi, “Messiah a juong tika hi mi hin a sin nêka tam sininkhêlngei sin thei ni mo?” an tia.
Phariseengeiin Jisua chungroia mipuingei an inkereng chichiena chong an rieta, masikin ochaisingei le Phariseengeiin Jisua sûr rangin rungpungei an tîra.
Jisua'n an kôm, “Chomolte nin kôm la om ka ta, masuole chu mi tîrpu kôm sêng ki tih, a tia.
Nangnin mi rok nin ta, mi mu no tunui, ke sena ranga nin se thei loi sikin.”
Juda rachamneipungei han anni nanâkin, “Ei mu thei loina rangin khotieng mo se rang a ti? Ei mingei omna Greek khopuilienngeia sea, male Greekngei juong minchu rang a ti mini? an tia.
Nangnin mi rok nin ta mi mu no tunui, ke sena ranga hong thei no tunui, a ti hih khoimo a tina?” an tia.
Khohoi chîn rang ni le nikhuo lupuitak ni han Jisua ândinga, rôl inringtakin, “Tukhom a tui ânrâl kai chu ko kôm hong senla ngeia, nêk rese ngei, male

7:38: Ezek 47:1; Zak 14:8Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, tukhom mi iem kai chu a sûng renga ‘Ringna-pêk’ tuinârngei luong suok atih,”7:38: Archang 37-38 taka Jisua chongbâingei hi ma anghin melet thei ani: “Tukhom a tui inrâl ngei chu ko kôm hong senla ngeia male nêk rese ngei. 38 Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, tukhom, mi iem kai chu an sûng renga ‘Ringna-pêk tuinârngei luong suok atih.’” a tipe ngeia.
Mahi Jisua'n ama iem ngeiin Ratha an chang rang chungroi a misîrna ani. Ma zora han Ratha pêk la nimaka; Jisua ha roiinpuia kaithoi ala ni loi sikin.
Mingei lâia senkhatin ha chong hah an rietin chu, “Hi mi hih Dêipu7:40: Dêipu ha: 1:21 en roh. tatak kêng ani ngihi!” an tia.
Adangngeiin chu, “Ama hih Messiah kêng ani!” an tia.
Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan Messiah chu Rêng David jâisuon renga nîng a ta, David omna khopui Bethlehema a suok rang ani,” an tia.7:42: 2 Sam 7:12; Mic 5:2
Masikin Jisua sikin mipuingei lâia insenna aom zoia.
Mi senkhatin sûr rang an bôka, aniatachu tutên a chunga an kut musum mak ngei.
Mi rungpungei ha an hong kîr nôka, Ochaisingei le Phariseengei han an kôm, “Ithomo nin hong tuong loi?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
Mi rungpungei han an thuona, “Hipa anga thurchi misîr reng la om ngâi mak ngei!” tiin an thuona.
Phariseengeiin an kôm, “Nangni khom huongin nin om sa mo ni zoi?” tiin an rekel ngeia.
“Rachamneipungei le Phariseengei lâia mi inkhat luon ama an iem zoi ti nin riet mo?
Hi mipuingei hih Moses Balam riet mak ngei, masikin Pathien khomâksâmna nuoia om kêng an ni!”
Phariseengei lâia mi inkhat Nicodemus, motona Jisua intongpui ranga sêpu ha a oma. Ama'n midangngei kôm,7:50: Jon 3:1,2
“Ei Balam dungjûiin chu tukhom a chongbâi suok ei riet mân le a sintho ei mu mân chu theiloi minchang thei ngâi mak me,” a tia.

“Asa,” anni ngei han a kôm, “Nang khom Galilee ram renga hong mo ni ni? Pathien Lekhabungei pore inla dêipu Galilee ram renga hong7:52: dêipu reng hong suok ngâi mak; ti hi miziek inkhatin a dôn chu dêipu reng hong suok no ni. suok ngâi mak ti riet ni tih,” tiin an thuona.
